name: <Cross-references fields>
description: Fields coming from cross references study (available only when it is active), see cross_references.csv.

name: assignee_data_bot
description: True/False if the assignee is a bot or not.

name: assignee_data_domain
description: Assignee's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_id
description: Assignee's id from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_name
description: Assignee's name.

name: assignee_data_org_name
description: Assignee's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_user_name
description: Assignee's username from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_uuid
description: Assignee's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_domain
description: Assignee's domain name from GitHub.

name: assignee_geolocation
description: Assignee's global location using coordinates.

name: assignee_location
description: Assignee's geographical location.

name: assignee_login
description: Assignee's login name from GitHub.

name: assignee_name
description: Assignee's name from GitHub.

name: assignee_org
description: Assignee's organization name from GitHub.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the author is a bot or not.

name: author_domain
description: Author's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_id
description: Author's ID from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Author's name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Author's username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Author's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: closed_at
description: Date when an issue was closed.

name: created_at
description: Date when an issue was opened.

name: github_repo
description: The name of the GitHub repository.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Issue creation date.

name: id_in_repo
description: The issue's ID in the repository it was created.

name: id
description: Issue's ID in GitHub.

name: is_github_issue
description: Used to separate issues from other items such as pull requests.

name: issue_url
description: Full URL of the issue.

name: item_type
description: The type of the item (issue/pull request).

name: labels
description: The labels assigned to an issue.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data were enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: pull_request
description: True/False if the item is a pull request or not.

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: state
description: State of the item (open/closed).

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: time_open_days
description: Time the item is open counted in days.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close an issue counted in days.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time to first attention to an issue counted in days.

name: title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by terms to allow searching.

name: title
description: The title of the issue.

name: updated_at
description: Date when the issue was last updated.

name: url_id
description: Consists of the project path and the issue's id.

name: url
description: Full URL of the issue.

name: user_data_bot
description: True/False if the user is a bot or not.

name: user_data_domain
description: User's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_id
description: User's ID from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_name
description: User's name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_org_name
description: Author's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_user_name
description: User's username from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_uuid
description: User's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: user_domain
description: User's domain name from GitHub.

name: user_geolocation
description: User's global location using coordinates.

name: user_location
description: User's geographical location.

name: user_login
description: User's login name from GitHub.

name: user_name
description: User's name.

name: user_org
description: User's organization name.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
